thread.title: Vicki Mote
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Vicki Mote

author: Vicki Mote
title: Vicki Mote
text: First time ordering glasses online. Got them in the mail, perfect fit, elegant design, progressive lenses are situated in exactly the right place for driving, computer use, and any other activity I've done since I started wearing them. I'm going to order another pair just as soon as the same promotion comes back that I used to order the ones I'm wearing now. Very reasonably price with the promotion!
